issue.title: Organism manager cannot download extraction files
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Organism manager cannot download extraction files.
He has access to all the order but cannot download the files, it fails with a raw json error.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Update: List of users/roles who should be able to download an orderfile :
* The client
* An organism manager of the client's organism
* An extraction responsible of the diffusion
* An organism manager of the diffusion's provider organism
